implementation_output.changes_summary: Added argparse CLI with --port, --skip-logs, --log-age options. Added check_log_file_age() function with platform-aware log directory resolution (tries daemon.paths.get_logs_dir first, falls back to manual platform detection). Updated all check functions to return 'pass'/'fail'/'skip' status strings. Enhanced summary section with PASS/FAIL/SKIP color-coded output and OVERALL verdict. Created comprehensive test suite with 24 tests covering argument parsing, log age checking, server connectivity, and main function integration.

results.details: Proper None guards: checks logs_dir.exists() before access, validates log_files list before iteration
port_override parameter properly checked with 'is not None' before use
Argument types properly validated: --port type=int, --log-age type=int, --skip-logs action=store_true
Log file iteration properly handles empty list case with explicit check

24 tests created, all passing. Coverage includes CLI parsing, log age checks (missing dir, no files, old files, recent files, multiple files), server connectivity with port override, status output formatting, and main function integration
